committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To prohibit the incineration of any hazardous material which has been transported in commerce.

summary.text: Makes it unlawful for any person to commercially incinerate hazardous material which has been transported in commerce. Sets forth penalties for violating this Act.

titles.title: To prohibit the incineration of any hazardous material which has been transported in commerce.
